page.title: 10HOME LIFE (2)
page.content: Mrs Hosking is a farmer's wife.She lives in a cottage with her husband and two children.She gets up at 8.00 a.m. and goes to the farm.Somedays she takes the children to playschool(She used to be a dentist)and group activities.She likes the area. Mrs Cooper is on holiday with her husband staying with her daughter and son in law.She gets up to see to the baby.In her spare time she does knitting and sewing.They like the area alot.She joined the{navy}when she was 19.She loves visiting places such as {Lizard and Falmouth.
